judges: Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree of the court below is affirmed on the adjudication of Judge Bolger. Costs to be paid from the corpus of the estate.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John F. Tímete, with him Myron M. Fineman, for appellants.
James E. Gallagher, Jr., with him Gerald Ronon, D. Alexander Wieland, Herbert R. Cain, Mercer L. Lewis and Stradley, Ronon, Stevens & Young, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
McKee Estate.
Argued April 15, 1954.
Before Stern, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
September 27, 1954:
John F. Tímete, with him Myron M. Fineman, for appellants.
James E. Gallagher, Jr., with him Gerald Ronon, D. Alexander Wieland, Herbert R. Cain, Mercer L. Lewis and Stradley, Ronon, Stevens & Young, for appellee.
